Name: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds
Title: Ghosts of Illyria
Desc: The Enterprise finds a contagion that ravages the ship, incapacitating everyone except Number One.
LongDescription: The U.S.S. Enterprise encounters a contagion that ravages the ship; one by one, the entire crew is incapacitated except for Number One, Una Chin-Riley, who must now confront a secret she's been hiding as she races to find a cure.
